name: ReRoll Dungeon
description: A game where everything is up to chance, Roll Dice to determine everything like Health, and abilities! This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 and is a proof of concept at most, will probably continue to develop and update in the future! and if you like this kind of game dev content check out my youtube channel where i show devlogs. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoCO2njrnDPZG_BWExyS5HQ
